mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.check_type_code AS "checkTypeCode", a.industry_type_code AS "industryTypeCode", a.item_amount AS "itemAmount", a.item_sub_amount AS "itemSubAmount", a.use_flag AS "useFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_check_system a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.check_type_code = '${checkTypeCode}'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_check_system( id, name, check_type_code, industry_type_code, item_amount, item_sub_amount, use_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{checkTypeCode}, #{industryTypeCode}, #{itemAmount}, #{itemSubAmount}, #{useFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bas_check_system SET name = #{name}, check_type_code = #{checkTypeCode}, industry_type_code = #{industryTypeCode}, item_amount = #{itemAmount}, item_sub_amount = #{itemSubAmount}, use_flag = #{useFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
